remark.ch: 資訊電機學院大學部四年級可選修。

goal.en: The goal of the course is to enable students to understand the basic principles of nonlinear control. In particular, after taking this course, students should be able to analyze the stability, performance and robustness of nonlinear systems.
goal.ch: 讓該課程的修課學生了解非線性系統的架構、及各種分析方法，包含穩定性分析、效能表現分析、強健性分析等。

content.en:
1. Basic analysis of nonlinear system
2. Analysis of feedback system
3. Advanced analysis of nonlinear system
4. Design of Nonlinear control
content.ch:
1. Basic analysis of nonlinear system
2. Analysis of feedback system
3. Advanced analysis of nonlinear system
4. Design of Nonlinear control

textbook.en: 1. Nonlinear Systems, by Hassan Khalil, 3rd Edition, 2002. 2. Applied Nonlinear Control, by J. E. Slotine, W. Li, Prentice-Hall, 1991.
textbook.ch: 1. Nonlinear Systems, by Hassan Khalil, 3rd Edition, 2002. 2. Applied Nonlinear Control, by J. E. Slotine, W. Li, Prentice-Hall, 1991.

grading.en: 1. Attendance ＆ Discussion (10％) 2. Midterm exam (45％) 3. Final report (45％)

flex_desc.en: To share and discuss the final report of this course.
flex_desc.ch: 課程期末報告分享與討論。

en.Assessments: Test/Exam ， Presentation/Oral Exam ， Research Report(printed on paper) ， Attendance/Performance ， Others
Presentation/Oral Exam ， Research Report(printed on paper) ， Attendance/Performance ， Others
